hero.beta: Open Beta - Try it for Free
hero.subtitle: The Evolution of the Spirit
hero.description: Install a new version of your consciousness. A platform that merges <purple> Artificial Intelligence </purple> with the ancestral wisdom of <purple> Tarot </purple> to guide you through your own Hero's Journey.

protocol.title: The <purple>Evolution</purple> Protocol
protocol.subtitle: Three steps to recode your reality and awaken your hidden potential.
protocol.step1_desc: Create your sacred profile. The system analyzes your name and date to establish your initial cosmic coordinates.
protocol.step2_desc: Consult the AI Oracle. Receive a deep reading based on the present moment and synchronicity.
protocol.step3_desc: The reading is saved in your "Soul Journal". Detect patterns and complete evolutionary missions.

faq.title: System <purple>Data</purple>
faq.a1: No. S.O.S. is based on synchronicity and psychological projection. We use the cards as symbolic mirrors to understand your present, not to predict an unalterable future.
faq.q2: How does the mystic AI work?
faq.a2: We use advanced language models trained with "The Hero's Journey" structures and Tarot de Marseille symbolism. The AI acts as a neutral facilitator.
faq.a3: Absolutely. Your journal is sacred. We use row-level security (RLS) in our database, which means it is technically impossible for another user to read your entries.

AstrologyPage.no_data_description: We need your exact birth date, time and place.

NumerologyPage.title: Pythagorean Numerology
NumerologyPage.about_desc: This system uses the Pythagorean method of assigning numerical values to the letters of the Latin alphabet. Each letter vibrates at a frequency from 1 to 9, allowing your name to be transformed into a mathematical sequence that represents your energetic identity.
NumerologyPage.input_desc: The system requires your full name and original birth date to decode your frequency.
NumerologyPage.results_desc: These are the vibrations that rule your life, your personality, and your soul's deepest longing.
NumerologyPage.interpretation_lifepath: Your **# Life Path ({number})** indicates the path you have come to travel. It is your main luggage and the central lesson of your incarnation.
NumerologyPage.interpretation_destiny: The **# Destiny ({number})** shows your natural talents and how you project yourself towards your goals. It is the tool you work with.
NumerologyPage.interpretation_soul: Your **# Soul Urge ({number})** reveals what really motivates you internally, your most secret longings and what gives you true happiness.
NumerologyPage.interpretation_personality: Finally, your **# Personality ({number})** is the "interface" you show to the world, how others perceive you before knowing your depth.
NumerologyPage.footer_quote: "Numbers do not rule your life, but they reveal the map you came with to navigate it."
